text: Apple's new operating system iOS 8 is
full of useful new tricks and there of
course things in there that you maybe
didn't know about before so here are my
top 5 iOS 8 hidden features to make you
more of an iphone or ipad expert number
one find out what's happening with your
battery the new version of iOS finally
lets you see exactly what's hogging the
battery life on your phone go to
settings general usage and then battery
usage and you'll see a list of apps and
which one is sucking down the most juice
it turns out that texting is kind of a
hog number to talk to siri hands-free
hey Siri navigate to 221 main street san
francisco california getting directions
to 221 main street san francisco holding
down the home button to access siri is
so iOS 7 go to settings general Siri and
then turn on hey Siri now your phone or
iPad will be listening for you all the
time unfortunately this feature only
works with your iPhone plugged in number
3 find out what song is playing what's
playing I believe this is still so good
the voice assistant now integrates with
shazam to listen to music that's playing
anywhere around you and Cirie should
give you the song the name of the artist
and even a link to buy it on iTunes
number 4 scan credit cards in Safari
this one is great for iPad users
especially if you're shopping on a
website and you get to the part where
you have to enter in your long credit
card number expiration date and security
code the Safari browser will give you an
option to just scan your card using the
camera on the iPhone or the iPad it
doesn't take a picture of the card it
just fills in all the numbers for you
number 5 use a different keyboard this
is something that Android users have had
for years you can now finally replace
the stock keyboard on your Apple phone
now that built-in keyboard is fine but
some people find that apps like swype
where you actually dragged across
letters to make words are way faster
that app is a dollar on iOS or my
favorite android keyboard called
swiftkey is free on iOS and it learns
all your typing habits were way better
autocorrect plus you can also
personalize the keyboard with themes
super
fun I'm sure you have some power user
tips of your own and if you do i would
love to hear about them please send them
to me at Mollywood on twitter
